analyzed: dmar la ljang khu'o/_/steng gi zhal ni stag gdong ste/_/dkar zhing sprin mdog

analyzed: 'khor lo sdom pa nyid thob shog_/sna tshhogs nor bu bde mchog 'khor lo'i sgrub
